mapper.select: select a.major_id as majorId, m.major_name as majorName, c.category_name as categoryName, a.adm_year as admYear, a.humanities_stu_count as humanitiesStuCount, a.science_stu_count as scienceStuCount, a.humanities_low as humanitiesLow, a.humanities_high as humanitiesHigh, a.science_low as scienceLow, a.science_high as scienceHigh, a.now_humanities_stu_count as nowHumanitiesStuCount, a.now_science_stu_count as nowScienceStuCount from admission a inner join major m using (major_id) inner join category c using (category_id) where a.adm_year = #{admYear} and c.category_name = #{categoryName};

select a.major_id as majorId, m.major_name as majorName, c.category_name as categoryName, a.adm_year as admYear, a.humanities_stu_count as humanitiesStuCount, a.science_stu_count as scienceStuCount, a.humanities_low as humanitiesLow, a.humanities_high as humanitiesHigh, a.science_low as scienceLow, a.science_high as scienceHigh, a.now_humanities_stu_count as nowHumanitiesStuCount, a.now_science_stu_count as nowScienceStuCount from admission a inner join major m using (major_id) inner join category c using (category_id)
AND a.adm_year = #{year}
AND a.major_id in (select major_id from major where category_id = #{categoryId})
AND a.science_stu_count > a.now_science_stu_count
AND a.humanities_stu_count > a.now_humanities_stu_count
mapper.update: update admission set now_humanities_stu_count = 0, now_science_stu_count = 0, humanities_high = 0, humanities_low = 0, science_high = 0, science_low = 0 where adm_year = #{admYear}
